comment.author: 29350288@N06
comment._content: Louis Armstrong's mother instilled in him a lifelong belief in the health benifits of regular use of laxitives. A large bottle of his favorite laxative brand for many years, Pluto Water, is seen at left. A few years later he switched to Swiss Kriss, which he championed for the rest of his life. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louis_Armstrong en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pluto_Water
